\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\cdot \&\& \cdot \& {\ker f \cap \ker g} \& {\ker f} \& {\ker f'} \\
	\&\&\& {\ker g} \& {\ker \varphi } \& {\ker f'} \\
	\cdot \&\& \cdot \& {\ker g'} \& {\ker g'}
	\arrow["f", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["g"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\varphi }"{description}, from=1-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{g'}", from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{f'}"', from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-4, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
